name: Wandering in the void
description:
• Use arrow keys to move
  • Don't stray too far from the invisible paths of the labyrinth!
  • Check the minimap - the already visited part of the labyrinth is displayed there
  • Find triangle

-----

Original description from ludumdare.com

This is a game about the Foursquare and his existential suffering. Help him to fill the inner emptiness.

This is a very hardcore game :)

In a gameworld there is an invisible path consisting of vertical and horizontal lines of the equal length. The Foursquare must move along those lines otherwise it will become transparent and will die. The goal of the game is to find the triangles to fill the Foursquare's inner emptiness.
